channel.title: Appendix on Little Go User Manual
channel.description: Recent content in Appendix on Little Go User Manual

item.title: FAQ
item.description: How do I change the board size? How do I start a new game? How can I pass / play a pass move? What are the functions of all those buttons? The computer is too strong / too weak, what can I do? Player influence is not displayed, or is completely wrong, what can I do? Move numbers / coordinate labels are not displayed even though they are enabled in the user preferences Markup labels are not displayed What is an “Auto-created player”?

item.title: Go rules
item.description: Overview Players Board Intersections Moves Liberties Stone groups Suicide rule Exception to Suicide rule No Repetition (ko) rule Life Overview This help section contains only a barebones introduction to the rules of Go. For a more thorough treatment please visit one of the many websites dedicated to the game. For instance, an excellent resource is Sensei’s Library while another more hands-on interactive tutorial is available on online-go.com. Players The game is played by two players.
